doc:
Matthew Wood (sound editor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthew_Wood_(sound_editor) 0 Matthew Russell Wood (born August 15, 1972) is an American sound engineer and voice actor. For the last 15 years, he has worked on numerous film projects, his work being credited as sound editing and sound design. He has been an innovative force within the industry, pioneering new technologies for motion pictures. He is currently a supervising sound editor employed at Skywalker Sound in Marin County, California. He also voices General Grievous in Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith, Star Wars: The Clone Wars and related media. Matthew_Russell_Wood ( born August_15_,_1972 ) is an_American_sound_engineer_and_voice_actor . He is currently a_supervising_sound_editor employed at Skywalker_Sound in Marin_County , California . He also voices General_Grievous in Star_Wars : Episode_III – Revenge of the_Sith , Star_Wars : The_Clone_Wars and related_media .
